verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:26
verses.text: How is it then, brethren? when ye come together, every one of you hath a psalm, hath a doctrine, hath a tongue, hath a revelation, hath an interpretation. Let all things be done unto edifying.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:27
verses.text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue, let it be by two, or at the most by three, and that by course; and let one interpret.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:28
verses.text: But if there be no interpreter, let him keep silence in the church; and let him speak to himself, and to God.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:29
verses.text: Let the prophets speak two or three, and let the other judge.
